record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 5 P.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 5 P.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - April 22, 2008)

[Page: S3271]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that it stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:24 p.m., adjourned until Wednesday, April 23, 2008, at 5 p.m.
